info.title: Solarnet Booking System API
info.description:
API documentation for Solarnet Booking system.

Before using an API you have to send a certificate request to Solarnet and get back the CID value to be able to send requests to the API.
When you send a request to the API your DATA value must be signed with your private key and signed string should be sent as additional SIGNATURE parameter.
Here is an example of how should your request look like:

{
CID: clientname, # this value will be provided by Solarnet
DATA: [], # data array to be sent. If no parameters available for request empty array must be used.
SIGNATURE: signed DATA value (base64 ecoded string)
}

Javascript:
Javascript signing tool could be found here: http://kjur.github.io/jsrsasign/
Example how to use a tool: https://github.com/kjur/jsrsasign/wiki/jsrsasign-Demo

PHP:
You can use buit-in PHP function openssl_sign()

NB! All request parameters described below must be a part of DATA value. Complete request must be converted to JSON format.

Please note that clientname in API URL will be provided by Solarnet for every client separately.

public_pictures_total.description: Total pictures amount in public book

sizes.description: All available image sizes stored physically on server. There is a possibility to add custom sizes through Solarnet Booking Sytsem settings

public_polaroids_total.description: Total polaroids amount in polaroids public book

public_covers_files.description: All model public covers images data

sizes.description: All available image sizes stored physically on server. There is a possibility to add custom sizes through Solarnet Booking Sytsem settings

public_campaigns_files.description: All model public covers images data

sizes.description: All available image sizes stored physically on server. There is a possibility to add custom sizes through Solarnet Booking Sytsem settings

public_videos_total.description: Total videos amount in public book

model_start_pictures_total.description: Total images in Start picture book

is_video.description: Flag showing if file is video

items.description: Possible field_key values are: instagram, googleplus, facebook, skype, twitter, blog, linkedin, myspace, pinterest, youtube, vimeo, phone, email

ui_logo_controls.description: UI LOGO controls. 1 - Dark logo, 2 - Light logo

422.description: Request parameters are in wrong format

parameters.name: agency_id
parameters.description: Agency ID is optional parameter to be sent. If no agency_id specified, global model books and information will be returned

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: Model ID

parameters.name: model_slug
parameters.description: Model slug

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: Preview hash. Used only to get unpublished models. Provided by _GET parameter from browser URL line

post.summary: Returns one model data by model ID

gender.description: Model gender. Possible values are Female / Male

initials.description: Model name initials. Example: Eva Fox will be returned as EF

start_picture.description: Model start picture for requested agency

default_bw.description: Start picture URL. Black and white picture

department_id.description: Model department id in requested agency

items.description: Possible field_key values are: instagram, googleplus, facebook, skype, twitter, blog, linkedin, myspace, pinterest, youtube, vimeo, phone, email

slug.description: Model URL slug. Unique value in Booking System database

items.description: Shows in which departments model is represented in all requested agencies. Depends on AGENCY ID or AGENCIES parameter

422.description: Request parameters are in wrong format

parameters.name: agency_id
parameters.description: Agency ID is required parameter to be sent. Search for models from only one agency. If 0 is set, agencies parameter must be used

parameters.name: agencies
parameters.description: Agencies IDs array to get data from multiple agencies. Is used only with agency_id = 0. Set agency ID as array value

parameters.name: department_id
parameters.description: Models department(s) ID(s). May be sent as integer or array of values. Ex. department_id = [12,25,17]

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Limit result by model gender. 1 - Female, 2 - Male. By default all genders will appear

parameters.name: model_type
parameters.description: Define a model type. 1 - Model, 2 - Talent

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: Search for models by first letter (firstname field). UTF-8 encoding is supported

parameters.name: search_string
parameters.description: Search for models by name string

parameters.name: limit_start
parameters.description: Results limitation (paging). Please note that default limitation starts from 0. Start result from this value

parameters.name: limit_total
parameters.description: Results limitation (paging). Show results to this value. If value is not set the default value will be set. Default value is 20

parameters.name: order_fields
parameters.description:
Order by model fields. Multiple fileds ordering is available. Default ordering is set to Name field and default order direction is ASC.
You can set an array of values in following format:

[
{"name" : {"order" : "asc"}},
{"gender" : {"order" : "desc"}}
]

Allowed fields are:
letter, name, gender

post.summary: Returns models array by requested params

gender.description: Model gender. Possible values are Female / Male

initials.description: Model name initials. Example: Eva Fox will be returned as EF

start_picture.description: Model start picture for requested agency

default_bw.description: Start picture URL. Black and white picture

items.description: Possible field_key values are: instagram, googleplus, facebook, skype, twitter, blog, linkedin, myspace, pinterest, youtube, vimeo, phone, email

slug.description: Model URL slug. Unique value in Booking System database

items.description: Shows in which departments model is represented in all requested agencies. Depends on AGENCY ID or AGENCIES parameter

422.description: Request parameters are in wrong format

parameters.name: models
parameters.description:
Model IDs array in the following format:
[20, 12, 45, 56720, 832]

parameters.name: images
parameters.description:
This should be an array of images IDs in the following format:
[20, 12, 45, 56720, 832]

post.summary: Returns requested models information with selection of images

success.description: If operation was successfulor not. Possible values are 1 and 0

422.description: Request parameters are in wrong format

parameters.name: agency_id
parameters.description: Agency ID

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: Model ID

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Recepient e-mail address. Please validate email address before sending request to the API.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action for sending pictures. Available values are: portfolio, selected

parameters.name: images
parameters.description:
If action is set to selected this parameter is required. This must be an array of images IDs in the following format:
[20, 12, 45, 56720, 832]

parameters.name: sender_name

parameters.description: Sender e-mail address. Please validate email address before sending request to the API.

parameters.name: sender_phone
parameters.description: Sender phone number

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: E-mail hash

parameters.name: web_url
parameters.description: Website URL. Ex. https://www.example.com/

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: E-mail title

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: E-mail message

original_src.description: Original logo image URL (Full size image)

sizes.description: All available logo sizes stored physically on server. There is a possibility to add custom sizes through Solarnet Booking Sytsem settings

time_format.description: Agency time format. 1 - 24 hours format, 2 - 12 hours format

week_starts_on.description: Calendar week starts on. 1 - Monday, 2 - Sunday

location_country.description: Agency physical location country. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code

female_name_in_agency.description: Department name in agency for Female models

male_name_in_agency.description: Department name in agency for Male models

female_public_profile_url.description: Website URL (all Female models) to open model profile directly from Solarnet Booking System or from package sent to client. Ex: example.com/model/{id}. NB! {id} would be automatically added to the URL

male_public_profile_url.description: Website URL (all Male models) to open model profile directly from Solarnet Booking System or from package sent to client. Ex: example.com/model/{id}. NB! {id} would be automatically added to the URL

department_type_id.description: Department type ID. Possible values are [1 => 'Models', 2 => 'Artists', 3 => 'Talents', 4 => 'Influencers']

422.description: Request parameters are in wrong format

parameters.name: agency_id
parameters.description: Agency ID is required parameter

template_nr.description: Which template to use. 1 is - Model with name only, 2 - Detailed model package

cm_inches.description: How to show model measurements. 0 - show both cm and inces, 1 - show cm only, 2 - show inces only

original_src.description: Original logo image URL (Full size image)

sizes.description: All available logo sizes stored physically on server. There is a possibility to add custom sizes through Solarnet Booking Sytsem settings

preview_message.description: Package global message for package preview

recipient.description: Recipient data. NB! This faield is available only if recipient_id is available

name.description: Recipient name as defined when sending package

global_message.description: Message set globally for all recipients

custom_message.description: Message set ONLY for this recipient

model_books_count.description: Total amount of books available in package

book_nr.description: Book number in package for current model

book_description.description: Book description in package for current model. Could be null if not defined

video_type.description: Available only if type_id = 4. Type of video
